channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 5:59 p.m. The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still ongoing in:- Kupyansky District- Kharkiv District- Lipetsk Territorial Community- Vovchan Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 5:59 p.m. The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still ongoing in:- Kupyansky District- Kharkiv District- Lipetsk Territorial Community- Vovchan Territorial Community#Харківська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 17:42 Repel the threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community. Follow further reports.

Follow further reports. #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 17:12 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
